articles.author: Chris Isidore
articles.title: The 52-year, 1,400-mile effort to finally see an eclipse - CNN
articles.description: Like millions of Americans I plan to see the total eclipse Monday afternoon. I’m willing to go to somewhat extreme measures to increase my chances on my third try.
articles.content:
Like millions of other Americans, I plan to see the total eclipse Monday afternoon.
Unlike most, Im ready to take somewhat extreme measures to increase my chances of having clear skies under which t… [+7121 chars]
